title: 1/23/18 -  'Uniting for Truth' (Marissa Streit joins Glenn)
description:
Hour 1 
Armageddon all over again?...Panic averted; ‘we've been saved’...where did those text messages go???...Concerns raised over FBI secret society?...Foul play from both sides?...draining the Justice Department swamp ...Cancer is eating at the fabric of the Republic...No Trust = Conspiracies ...Uniting for truth ...Quantum physics sex? ...Wasserman Schultz Shocker?...maybe Alex Jones was right…Aliens living among us?

 

Hour 2 
Disturbing update on the Turpin family…another ‘Kate Plus 8’?... Reality show mom star wannabe ...'12 Strong' movie: The real-life horse soldiers join the show...Battle of all battles...in the harrowing days following 9/11 when an elite U.S. Special Forces unit led the way to an extremely dangerous mission ...Corruption all around ...Megyn Kelly vs. 'Hanoi Jane'...'plastic' bullets fly?
 
Hour 3
Supreme Court Justice like a rock star?... she’s ‘notorious’...a step too far? ...PragerU vs. Silicon Valley...Marissa Streit, CEO of PragerU, joins the show....'Alt-right' escalates war against Silicon Valley?...conflating conservatives with Nazis...'The Big 4' are silencing voices every day?...Americans need to wake up! ...blaming algorithms? ...audio from Rand Paul’s 911 call after his assault is released, but something is missing?...he doesn’t say this word ...Enormous amount of love for sharks?... where is the high ground? ...Mike Pence continues push?
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
